name: Arctic Assault VR - Sniper Edition
description:
** HEAD SHOTS, SNIPER KILLS, & MORE! **
** SUPER HD 3D GRAPHICS! **

Get ready for an ultra realistic shooting game where you play a member of an elite arctic sniper team on a mission to infiltrate a terrorist base and take out all the rival militants.

\hoose from several different weapons, assault rifles, sniper rifles and even gatling guns. Get powerups in game to improve your weapons.
One by one you shoot your way through until you come out victorious!

FEATURES

- Awesome 3D graphics.
- Intense sniper action!
- Wicked soundtrack!
- Upgrade your weapons in game
- Realistic grenade explosions
